bug.short_desc: Radiobutton error at startup in IE

long_desc.thetext:
This is the log of the trunk:
Could not refine property "group" without a "refine" flag in the property definition! This class: qx.ui.toolbar.RadioButton, original class: qx.ui.form.ToggleButton. Class.js?nocache=0.8298742381882926, rad 1192 tecken 13
Class qx.ui.toolbar.RadioButton could not refine property: group! Key: check could not be refined! Class.js?nocache=0.8298742381882926, rad 1198 tecken 15
Class qx.ui.toolbar.RadioButton could not refine property: group! Key: apply could not be refined! Class.js?nocache=0.8298742381882926, rad 1198 tecken 15
Class qx.ui.toolbar.RadioButton could not refine property: group! Key: nullable could not be refined! Class.js?nocache=0.8298742381882926, rad 1198 tecken 15

temporary intra-trunk issue
